      • withVerificationPolicy

        public EnvelopePackagingFactory.Builder withVerificationPolicy(VerificationPolicy verificationPolicy)
        Passes provided verification policy to built packaging factory instead of the default InternalVerificationPolicy.

        NB! 'null' is valid and disables verification.

        Parameters:
        verificationPolicy - the verification policy you want to use.
        Returns:
        The same builder.
